label: App & Login Issues
top_keywords: account, app, hours, login, mobile, cannot, any, access, mobile app, authentication
example_texts: an international transaction was blocked without notifying me. i was traveling abroad and could not use my card for 6 hours. | my atm withdrawal of 300 was deducted from my account but the machine did not dispense the cash. i need this refunded immediately. | my recurring payment failed this month even though the account has sufficient funds. this is causing issues with my service providers.

label: Transaction Problems
top_keywords: keeps, issue, online, cannot, payment, minutes, system, though, number, department
example_texts: i made a purchase online and the transaction shows as pending for 8 days. the merchant says they were paid but i see no confirmation. | contactless payment keeps failing at checkout. the chip works fine but tap-to-pay has not worked for two weeks. | the app keeps logging me out randomly while i am in the middle of a transaction. i have to start the whole process over each time.

label: Billing & Fee Disputes
top_keywords: card, credit, credit card, though, card declined, declined, balance, statement, immediately, never
example_texts: my credit card was declined at the grocery store even though i had sufficient funds. i checked my balance immediately after and it was fine. very embarrassing. | i noticed an unauthorized charge of 350.00 on my credit card. i did not make this purchase and need it disputed immediately. | my credit card has been declined multiple times today at different merchants. there is plenty of available credit on the card.

label: Billing & Fee Disputes
top_keywords: charged, fee, transfer, needs, fees, account, transaction, twice, received, overdraft
example_texts: i was charged twice for the same transaction of 89.99. the duplicate charge needs to be reversed as soon as possible. | my online transfer of 500 to my savings account failed twice but i was charged both times. where is my money? | i attempted a wire transfer of 2000 and it failed. the money was debited from my account but never arrived at the destination.

label: Billing & Fee Disputes
top_keywords: loan, application, statement, mortgage, department, refinance, different, submitted, rate, ago
example_texts: my direct deposit has not arrived even though my employer confirmed it was sent two days ago. i need access to my paycheck. | my mortgage statement shows a different interest rate than what was in my loan agreement. i need a corrected statement sent. | the mortgage department has disconnected my call three times while i was waiting to speak with a specialist about my refinance.
